sqlMap.sql:
where paytype_code='0201'
MASTER.ND = #nd#
MASTER.PROC_DATE >= #startDate#
MASTER.PROC_DATE <= #endDate#
MASTER.FUND_CODE = #fundCode#
MASTER.A_STATUS_CODE = #astatusCode#
MASTER.PRINT_TIMES = 0
MASTER.PRINT_TIMES > 0
MASTER.EXP_TIMES = 0
MASTER.EXP_TIMES > 0
sqlMap.select:
SELECT PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID, ND, VOU_NO, PROC_DATE, INPUTOR_ID, CDATE, OPERATION_TYPE_CODE, , PRINT_TIMES, CP_ADJUST_CODE, AGENT_BANK_CODE, , PAY_CODE, PAY_NAME, PAY_BANK_CODE, PAY_BANK_NO, PAY_BANK_NAME, PAY_ACC_CODE, PAY_ACC_NAME, PAY_ACC_NO, RECE_CODE, RECE_NAME, RECE_BANK_CODE, RECE_BANK_NAME, RECE_BANK_NO, RECE_ACC_CODE, RECE_ACC_NAME, RECE_ACC_NO, FUND_CODE, , ORIGIN_CODE, , PAYTYPE_CODE, PAYTYPE_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, PROCESS_INST_ID, AUDITOR_ID, A_DATE, A_OPINION, A_STATUS_CODE, , AN_STATUS, IS_VALID, CANCELER_ID, CANCEL_DATE, CANCEL_OPINION, REMARK, SUM_MONEY, D_ATTR1, D_ATTR2, D_ATTR3, D_ATTR4, D_ATTR5, STAMP FROM CP_PAY_TRANSFER_VOU MASTER
ORDER BY MASTER.VOU_NO DESC

SELECT PAY_TRANSFER_LIST_ID, PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID, SEQU, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME, OUTLAY_CODE, OUTLAY_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE_CODE, PROJECT_TYPE_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, ORIGIN_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE, PAYOUT_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, PAY_NAME, PAY_BANK_CODE, PAY_BANK_NO, PAY_BANK_NAME, PAY_ACC_CODE, PAY_ACC_NAME, PAY_ACC_NO, PAY_VOU_NO, REMARK, MONEY, MONEY1, MONEY2, MONEY3, D_ATTR1, D_ATTR2, D_ATTR3, D_ATTR4, D_ATTR5, STAMP, D_ATTR1_NAME, D_ATTR2_NAME, D_ATTR3_NAME, D_ATTR4_NAME, D_ATTR5_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE, INCEPTDOC_NAME, SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME, SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE, VOU_NO_1, ND FROM CP_PAY_TRANSFER_LIST MASTER WHERE MASTER.PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID = #value#

select * from CP_PAY_TRANSFER_LIST where PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID in ( select PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID from CP_PAY_TRANSFER_VOU master
)

SELECT * FROM CP_PAY_TRANSFER_RELATION WHERE PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID in ( select PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID from CP_PAY_TRANSFER_VOU master
)
SELECT * FROM CP_PAY_TRANSFER_RELATION MASTER WHERE MASTER.PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID = #value#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CP_VOUCHER T SET T.PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID = #payTransferVouId# WHERE T.CP_VOUCHER_ID IN ($payVouNoList$)
UPDATE CP_VOUCHER SET PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID = null where PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID=#payTransferVouId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CP_PAY_TRANSFER_VOU (PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID, ND, VOU_NO, PROC_DATE, INPUTOR_ID, CDATE, OPERATION_TYPE_CODE, PRINT_TIMES, CP_ADJUST_CODE, AGENT_BANK_CODE, AGENT_BANK_NAME, PAY_CODE, PAY_NAME, PAY_BANK_CODE, PAY_BANK_NO, PAY_BANK_NAME, PAY_ACC_CODE, PAY_ACC_NAME, PAY_ACC_NO, RECE_CODE, RECE_NAME, RECE_BANK_CODE, RECE_BANK_NAME, RECE_BANK_NO, RECE_ACC_CODE, RECE_ACC_NAME, RECE_ACC_NO, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, ORIGIN_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, PAYTYPE_CODE, PAYTYPE_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, PROCESS_INST_ID, AUDITOR_ID, A_DATE, A_OPINION, A_STATUS_CODE, AN_STATUS, IS_VALID, CANCELER_ID, CANCEL_DATE, CANCEL_OPINION, REMARK, SUM_MONEY, D_ATTR1, D_ATTR2, D_ATTR3, D_ATTR4, D_ATTR5, STAMP ) VALUES ( #payTransferVouId:VARCHAR#, #nd:DECIMAL#, #vouNo:VARCHAR#, #procDate:DATE#, #inputorId:VARCHAR#, #cdate:DATE#, #operationTypeCode:VARCHAR#, #printTimes:VARCHAR#, #cpAdjustCode:VARCHAR#, #agentBankCode:VARCHAR#, #agentBankName:VARCHAR#, #payCode:VARCHAR#, #payName:VARCHAR#, #payBankCode:VARCHAR#, #payBankNo:VARCHAR#, #payBankName:VARCHAR#, #payAccCode:VARCHAR#, #payAccName:VARCHAR#, #payAccNo:VARCHAR#, #receCode:VARCHAR#, #receName:VARCHAR#, #receBankCode:VARCHAR#, #receBankName:VARCHAR#, #receBankNo:VARCHAR#, #receAccCode:VARCHAR#, #receAccName:VARCHAR#, #receAccNo:VARCHAR#, #fundCode:VARCHAR#, #fundName:VARCHAR#, #originCode:VARCHAR#, #originName:VARCHAR#, #paytypeCode:VARCHAR#, #paytypeName:VARCHAR#, #manageCode:VARCHAR#, #manageName:VARCHAR#, #processInstId:DECIMAL#, #auditorId:VARCHAR#, #adate:DATE#, #aopinion:VARCHAR#, #astatusCode:VARCHAR#, #anStatus:VARCHAR#, #isValid:VARCHAR#, #cancelerId:VARCHAR#, #cancelDate:DATE#, #cancelOpinion:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #sumMoney:DECIMAL#, #dattr1:VARCHAR#, #dattr2:VARCHAR#, #dattr3:VARCHAR#, #dattr4:VARCHAR#, #dattr5:VARCHAR#, #stamp:DECIMAL# )

INSERT INTO CP_PAY_TRANSFER_LIST (PAY_TRANSFER_LIST_ID, PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID, SEQU, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME, OUTLAY_CODE, OUTLAY_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE_CODE, PROJECT_TYPE_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, ORIGIN_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE, PAYOUT_NAME, MANAGE_CODE, MANAGE_NAME, PAYTYPE_CODE, PAYTYPE_NAME, SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME, PAY_NAME, PAY_BANK_CODE, PAY_BANK_NO, PAY_BANK_NAME, PAY_ACC_CODE, PAY_ACC_NAME, PAY_ACC_NO, PAY_VOU_NO, VOU_NO, VOU_NO_1, REMARK, MONEY, MONEY1, MONEY2, MONEY3, D_ATTR1, D_ATTR2, D_ATTR3, D_ATTR4, D_ATTR5, STAMP, D_ATTR1_NAME, D_ATTR2_NAME, D_ATTR3_NAME, D_ATTR4_NAME, D_ATTR5_NAME, ND) VALUES( #payTransferListId:VARCHAR#, #payTransferVouId:VARCHAR#, #sequ:DECIMAL#, #orgCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT org_name FROM v_cp_org WHERE org_code=#orgCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #coCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT CO_NAME FROM MA_COMPANY WHERE CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #baccCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT b_acc_name FROM ma_bacc WHERE b_acc_code=#baccCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #outlayCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT outlay_name FROM ma_outlaytype WHERE outlay_code=#outlayCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #projectTypeCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT project_type_name FROM ma_project_type WHERE project_type_code=#projectTypeCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #projectCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT pd_project_name FROM v_cp_project WHERE pd_project_code=#projectCode:VARCHAR#), #fundCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT fund_name FROM ma_cp_fund WHERE fund_code=#fundCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #originCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT Origin_name FROM ma_cp_origin WHERE Origin_code=#originCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #payoutCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT payout_name FROM ma_cp_payout WHERE payout_code=#payoutCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #manageCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT manage_name FROM ma_cp_manage WHERE manage_code=#manageCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #paytypeCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT PAYTYPE_NAME FROM MA_CP_PAYTYPE WHERE PAYTYPE_CODE = #paytypeCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #sendDocCode:VARCHAR#, (SELECT SENDDOC_NAME FROM MA_CP_SENDDOC WHERE SENDDOC_CODE = #sendDocCode:VARCHAR# AND ND=#nd:DECIMAL#), #payName:VARCHAR#, #payBankCode:VARCHAR#, #payBankNo:VARCHAR#, #payBankName:VARCHAR#, #payAccCode:VARCHAR#, #payAccName:VARCHAR#, #payAccNo:VARCHAR#, #payVouNo:VARCHAR#, #vouNo:VARCHAR#, #vouNo1:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #money:VARCHAR#, #money1:DECIMAL#, #money2:DECIMAL#, #money3:DECIMAL#, #dattr1:VARCHAR#, #dattr2:VARCHAR#, #dattr3:VARCHAR#, #dattr4:VARCHAR#, #dattr5:VARCHAR#, #stamp:DECIMAL#, (SELECT extend_name FROM ma_cp_extend WHERE extend_code=#dattr1:VARCHAR# AND nd=#nd:DECIMAL# AND extend_type='01'), (SELECT extend_name FROM ma_cp_extend WHERE extend_code=#dattr2:VARCHAR# AND nd=#nd:DECIMAL# AND extend_type='02'), (SELECT extend_name FROM ma_cp_extend WHERE extend_code=#dattr3:VARCHAR# AND nd=#nd:DECIMAL# AND extend_type='03'), (SELECT extend_name FROM ma_cp_extend WHERE extend_code=#dattr4:VARCHAR# AND nd=#nd:DECIMAL# AND extend_type='04'), (SELECT extend_name FROM ma_cp_extend WHERE extend_code=#dattr5:VARCHAR# AND nd=#nd:DECIMAL# AND extend_type='05'), #nd:DECIMAL# )
INSERT INTO CP_PAY_TRANSFER_RELATION (PAY_TRANSFER_RELATION_ID, CP_VOUCHER_ID, PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID) VALUES (#payTransferRelationId#, #cpVoucherId#, #payTransferVouId#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM CP_PAY_TRANSFER_VOU T WHERE T.PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID = #payTransferVouId#
DELETE FROM CP_PAY_TRANSFER_LIST T WHERE T.PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID = #payTransferVouId#
DELETE FROM CP_PAY_TRANSFER_RELATION T WHERE T.PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID = #payTransferVouId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CP_PAY_TRANSFER_VOU T SET T.A_STATUS_CODE = #status# WHERE T.PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID IN ($ids$)
UPDATE CP_PAY_TRANSFER_VOU T SET T.PRINT_TIMES = T.PRINT_TIMES + 1 WHERE T.PAY_TRANSFER_VOU_ID IN ($value$)
